translated: Then, confer the empowerment of longevity and recite the benediction.

original: khrus bya zhing snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la brgya rtsa brgyad zlos su gzhug go //
analyzed: khrus bya zhing snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la brgya rtsa brgyad zlos su gzhug go //
translated: Bathe, and have the one to be initiated recite the extensive or concise essence mantra one hundred and eight times.

original: mi shigs pa lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la gzhag go //
analyzed: mi shigs pa lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la gzhag go //
translated: Bless the entire body of the one to be initiated as being indestructible vajra.
